```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
surveys <- read_csv("../197-raw_storage/surveys.csv")
species <- read_csv( "../197-raw_storage/species.csv")
plots <- read_csv("../197-raw_storage/plots.csv")
```

## Homework

```{r Exercise 5}
inner_join(surveys, species, by = "species_id") %>% 
  inner_join(plots, by = "plot_id") %>% 
  select(month,day,year, species_id, weight, hindfoot_length) %>%
  filter(!is.na(weight)) %>% 
  arrange(species_id,desc(weight)) %>% 
  head()
```
